20  ball::ball()
21  {
22  //ball
23  sub_grid_ = nh.subscribe("SphereInfo", 1, &ball::ballInfo, this);
24  vis_pub = nh.advertise<visualization_msgs::Marker>( "visualization_marker", 1 );
25  nh.param<std::string>("obstacle_list" , obstacle_avoidance, "obstacle_pose");
26  obstacles_subscribe_ = nh.subscribe(obstacle_avoidance.c_str(), 1, &ball::InfoGeometry, this);
27  Force_attractive = Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>::Zero();
28  F_repulsive = Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>::Zero();
29  x_dot = Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>::Zero();

33  void ball::ballInfo(const std_msgs::Float64MultiArray::ConstPtr &msg)
34  {
35  ball_pos = Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>::Zero();
36  pos_des = Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>::Zero();
37 
38  //initial ball position
39  ball_pos(0) = msg->data[0];
40  ball_pos(1) = msg->data[1];
41  ball_pos(2) = msg->data[2];
42  radius = msg->data[3];
43  mass = msg->data[4];
44  //desired ball position
45  pos_des(0) = msg->data[5];
46  pos_des(1) = msg->data[6];
47  pos_des(2) = msg->data[7];
48 
49  SeeMarker(pos_des, "pose_desired");
50  SeeMarker(ball_pos, "pose_init");
51 
52  Update();
53  }
54 
55  void ball::Update()
56  {
57  F_repulsive = GetFieldRep(ball_pos);
58  double Kp,Kd;
59  Kp = 200;
60  Kd = 100;
61 
62  x_err_ = pos_des - ball_pos;
63 
64  for(int i = 0; i < Force_attractive.size(); i++)
65  {
66  Force_attractive(i) = (-Kd * (x_dot(i)) + Kp * x_err_(i)) / mass;
67  }
68 
69  Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1> Force_tot = Force_attractive + F_repulsive;
70  double delta = 0.1;
71  GetVelocityAndPosition(Force_tot,delta); // Force is just divide by mass
72 
73  ros::spinOnce();
74  }
75 
76 
77 
78  void ball::GetVelocityAndPosition(Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1> &Force, double delta)
79  {
80  Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1> velocity_last = x_dot;
81  Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1> pos_last = ball_pos;
82 
83  x_dot = velocity_last + delta * Force;
84  ball_pos = 0.5 * Force * delta * delta + x_dot * delta + pos_last;
85 
86  DrawSphere( ball_pos );
87  }

91  void ball::SeeMarker(Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1> &Pos, std::string obst_name)
92  {
93  // std::string obst_name= "pose_desired" ;
94  tf::Transform tfGeomTRansform;
95  geometry_msgs::Pose p;
96  p.position.x = Pos(0);
97  p.position.y = Pos(1);
98  p.position.z = Pos(2);
99  p.orientation.x = 0;
100  p.orientation.y = 0;
101  p.orientation.z = 0;
102  p.orientation.w = 1;
103  tf::poseMsgToTF( p, tfGeomTRansform );
104  // tf::poseMsgToKDL(p, frames);
105  tf_geometriesTransformations_.sendTransform( tf::StampedTransform( tfGeomTRansform, ros::Time::now(), "vito_anchor", obst_name.c_str()) );
106  }

109  void ball::InfoGeometry(const desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesArray::ConstPtr& msg)
110  {
111  Object_radius.clear();
112  Object_height.clear();
113  Object_position.clear();
114 
115  for(unsigned int i=0; i < msg->geometries.size(); i++)
116  {
117  KDL::Frame frame_obj;
118  Object_radius.push_back(msg->geometries[i].info[0]); //radius
119  Object_height.push_back(msg->geometries[i].info[1]); //height
120 
121  tf::poseMsgToKDL(msg->geometries[i].pose, frame_obj);
122  Object_position.push_back(frame_obj);
123  }
124 
125  DrawCylinder();
126  }
127 
128  void ball::DrawCylinder()
129  {
130  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < Object_position.size(); ++i)
131  {
132  visualization_msgs::Marker marker;
133  marker.header.frame_id = "vito_anchor";
134  marker.header.stamp = ros::Time();
135  marker.ns = "";
136  marker.id = i;
137  marker.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::CYLINDER;
138  marker.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
139 
140  marker.pose.position.x = Object_position[i].p.x();
141  marker.pose.position.y = Object_position[i].p.y();
142  marker.pose.position.z = Object_position[i].p.z();
143  double x,y,z,w;
144  Object_position[i].M.GetQuaternion(x,y,z,w);
145 
146  marker.pose.orientation.x = x;
147  marker.pose.orientation.y = y;
148  marker.pose.orientation.z = z;
149  marker.pose.orientation.w = w;
150 
151  marker.scale.x = Object_radius[i];
152  marker.scale.y = Object_radius[i];
153  marker.scale.z = Object_height[i];
154 
155  marker.color.a = 1.0; // for the clearness
156  marker.color.r = 0.0;
157  marker.color.g = 0.0;
158  marker.color.b = 1.0;
159  marker.lifetime = ros::Duration(100);
160  marker_publisher_.publish(marker);
161 
162  std::string obst_name= "obj_" + std::to_string(i);
163 
164  tf::Transform tfGeomTRansform;
165  geometry_msgs::Pose p;
166  tf::poseKDLToMsg (Object_position[i], p );
167  tf::poseMsgToTF( p, tfGeomTRansform );
168  tf_geometriesTransformations_.sendTransform( tf::StampedTransform( tfGeomTRansform, ros::Time::now(), "vito_anchor", obst_name.c_str()) );
169 
170 
171  }
172  }

174  void ball::DrawSphere( Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1> &pos_ball )
175  {
176  // std::cout<<"disegno"<<std::endl;
177 
178  visualization_msgs::Marker marker;
179 
180  // Set the frame ID and timestamp. See the TF tutorials for information on these.
181  marker.header.frame_id = "vito_anchor";
182  marker.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
183 
184  marker.type = marker.SPHERE;
185  marker.action = marker.ADD;
186  marker.scale.x = 0.2;
187  marker.scale.y = 0.2;
188  marker.scale.z = 0.2;
189  marker.color.a = 1.0;
190  marker.pose.orientation.w = 1.0;
191  marker.pose.position.x = pos_ball(0);
192  marker.pose.position.y = pos_ball(1);
193  marker.pose.position.z = pos_ball(2);
194  marker.lifetime = ros::Duration(1000);
195 
196  vis_pub.publish(marker);
197  }

199  Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1> ball::GetFieldRep(Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1> &point_pos)
200  {
201 
202  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1> > F_rep;
203  //repulsive with obj
204  for(unsigned int i=0; i < Object_position.size(); i++)
205  {
206  double influence = Object_radius[i] + 0.2;
207  std::vector<KDL::Vector> pos;
208  KDL::Vector ball_pos_kdl(point_pos(0),point_pos(1),point_pos(2));
209  pos.push_back(ball_pos_kdl);
210  std::pair<Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>, double> ForceAndIndex;
211  ForceAndIndex = pfc.GetRepulsiveForce(pos, influence, Object_position[i], Object_radius[i], Object_height[i]);
212  F_rep.push_back(ForceAndIndex.first);
213  }
214 
215  Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1> f = Eigen::Matrix<double,6,1>::Zero();
216 
217  for(unsigned int k=0; k < F_rep.size();k++)
218  {
219  f = f + F_rep[k]/mass;
220  }
221 
222  return f;
223  }
